extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite  (ENGL200 & ENGL290) and (a GPA of 2.4 on all ENGL units) and (registration in an ENGL Major or Medial Plan).

basic.description: Studies in literary topics focused on ¿the long nineteenth century¿ that do not fit within the established Group II rubrics (Romantic Literature, Victorian Literature, Literature of the Americas). For detailed information, consult the Department.
basic.subject: ENGL
basic.title: Group II: Special Topics II
